title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain spaghetti and quickly mix with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve hot with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, then grill until cooked.
Sauté onions in a pan until golden brown.
Add tomatoes and cook into a thick sauce.
Stir in cream and grilled chicken.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy meal with fresh vegetables sautéed in soy sauce and garlic.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, and snow peas.
Stir-fry for 5–6 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce, toss well, and serve hot with rice or noodles.
